name: ManaCoin
description: What is the project about? An innovative decentralized protocol on the Ethereum network, anchored by the $MNC token, characterized by its ever-advancing randomized tokenomics, which encompass ETH reflections, true burns, intelligent auto LP management, and custom utilities. What makes your project unique? Mana Coin Token ($MNC) is an ERC20 token known for its hyper-deflationary nature, featuring smart auto LP and Ethereum reflections. Through each interaction, the $MNC token's smart contract dynamically adjusts its function, providing rewards to holders in the form of true burn, smart LP contributions, or Ethereum reflections.
